sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { User, Briefcase, TrendingUp, Users, CheckCircle } from 'lucide-react'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; const Dashboard = () => { const { user, isJobSeeker } = useAuth(); // Mock data - in a real app, this would come from API calls const mockJobSeekerData = { appliedJobs: 12, savedJobs: 8, profileViews: 25, recentApplications: [ { id: 1, title: 'Frontend Developer', company: 'TechCorp', status: 'pending', appliedDate: '2024-01-15' }, { id: 2, title: 'React Developer', company: 'StartupXYZ', status: 'interview', appliedDate: '2024-01-10' }, { id: 3, title: 'Full Stack Engineer', company: 'BigTech Inc', status: 'rejected', appliedDate: '2024-01-05' } ] }; const mockRecruiterData = { activeJobs: 5, totalApplications: 48, shortlistedCandidates: 12, recentJobs: [ { id: 1, title: 'Frontend Developer', applications: 15, status: 'active', postedDate: '2024-01-12' }, { id: 2, title: 'Backend Developer', applications: 8, status: 'active', postedDate: '2024-01-10' }, { id: 3, title: 'UX Designer', applications: 22, status: 'closed', postedDate: '2024-01-08' } ] }; const data = isJobSeeker() ? mockJobSeekerData : mockRecruiterData; const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'pending': case 'active': return 'text-yellow-600 bg-yellow-100'; case 'interview': return 'text-blue-600 bg-blue-100'; case 'rejected': case 'closed': return 'text-red-600 bg-red-100'; case 'accepted': return 'text-green-600 bg-green-100'; default: return 'text-gray-600 bg-gray-100'; } }; return (
{/* Header */}

Welcome back, {user?.firstName}!

{isJobSeeker() ? "Here's your job search overview" : "Here's your recruitment dashboard" }

{/* Stats Cards */}
{isJobSeeker() ? ( <>

Applied Jobs

{data.appliedJobs}

Saved Jobs

{data.savedJobs}

Profile Views

{data.profileViews}

Response Rate

67%

) : ( <>

Active Jobs

{data.activeJobs}

Total Applications

{data.totalApplications}

Shortlisted

{data.shortlistedCandidates}

Hiring Rate

84%

)}
{/* Recent Activity */}
{/* Recent Applications/Jobs */}

{isJobSeeker() ? 'Recent Applications' : 'Recent Job Posts'}

{data.recentJobs?.length > 0 ? (
{data.recentJobs.map((item) => (

{item.title}

{isJobSeeker() ? item.company : `${item.applications} applications`}

Applied {item.appliedDate}

{item.status}
))}
) : (

{isJobSeeker() ? "No applications yet. Start applying to jobs!" : "No jobs posted yet. Create your first job posting!" }

{isJobSeeker() ? "Browse Jobs" : "Post a Job"}
)}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

{isJobSeeker() ? ( <> Browse Jobs Update Profile View Applications ) : ( <> Post New Job View Candidates Company Profile )}
); }; export default Dashboard;
